Random Response¶

What it is¶

The random response mechanism only uses zeros and ones. It flips a coin, and if it lands on heads, it returns the truth. If it’s tails, then it flips it again. If it’s heads this time, it returns 1, otherwise, it returns 0.

How to Use It¶

The random response mechaism can be called using the random() mechansim.

randresponse(response_list)

The parameter response_list is a list of responses. These can only be zeros and ones.
